A4.text: The most recent film adaptation, Jane Eyre, was released in 2011, directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga, and starred Mia Wasikowska as Jane Eyre and Michael Fassbender as Mr. Rochester

A5.text: Anna Karenina is a 2012 historical romantic drama film directed by Joe Wright
